pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, October 12, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Durham Region, Ontario

11:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local supermarket. Leader of the Government in the House of Commons Mark Holland and Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs, Infrastructure and Communities Jennifer O’Connell will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will highlight the government’s plan to make life more affordable for Canadians. A media availability will follow. Leader of the Government in the House of Commons Mark Holland and Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs, Infrastructure and Communities Jennifer O’Connell will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet seniors at a local community centre.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

Greater Toronto Area, Ontario

Private meetings

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet representatives of the Ontario Women’s Hockey Association. Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Foreign Affairs Rob Oliphant and Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Health and Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Sport Adam van Koeverden will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
